description:
Mike was a referral from a friend. He was one of those guys that immediately said yes to doing a video.
I love it when that happens because it usually means they are pretty confident about their endowment, and Mike doesn't disappoint.
We did some photos, and he asked me several times if I liked what I was seeing, if he was doing ok, and if his dick was big enough. Oh yeah, it's big enough! He is very quiet, and I had to tweak the audio settings during the interview so you could actually hear what he was saying.
He normally has more pubic hair, and he had just shaved it, so we just missed full on bush. But Mike had a great time doing the solo and says he will be back for more, and is getting himself ready to do more projects with the site. I can't wait, he was really cool to work with!
title: Mike North - Solo
